snippet: GMORA--Joyce D.,passed away suddenly April 9, 2016, at age 87. Beloved wife of the late Dr. Sherwin Gmora, cherished mother of Barbara and Joan (Jonathan Birnbach), adoring grandmother of Jenna and Julia. She will be profoundly missed by her family and friends. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GMORA--Joyce D.,passed away suddenly April 9, 2016, at age 87. Beloved wife of the late Dr. Sherwin Gmora, cherished mother of Barbara and Joan (Jonathan Birnbach), adoring grandmother of Jenna and Julia. She will be profoundly missed by her family and friends. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GMORA, JOYCE D.
